name: Pizza Tower: Combo Time!
description:
pizza tower is made by mcpig, im just modding it.

if you want to play the actual game (you should) here it is https://pizzatowerguy.itch.io/pizza-tower-demo

Pizza Tower Sage 2019, BUT WITH COMBOS!!!!

get a combo of 29 or more to get score/points every second (lasts until you lose your combo)

every level you have a combo saver that can only be used 3 times, jump and press A to use it. (it makes your combotime larger)

more levels (im still working on modding other levels in)

im planning on adding more combo buffs, to make the combos have more worth.
